alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 27 at 10:43AM CDT until August 27 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR PORTIONS OF NORTHEAST LOUISIANA, SOUTHEAST ARKANSAS, NORTHWEST, WESTERN, SOUTH CENTRAL AND SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI... * AFFECTED AREA...Richland, Franklin LA, Catahoula, Tensas Concordia, Morehouse, West Carroll, East Carroll and Madison LA Parishes in Louisiana. Ashley and Chicot in Arkansas. Claiborne, Copiah, Jefferson, Adams, Franklin MS, Lincoln, Lawrence, Jefferson Davis, Marion, Lamar, Forrest, Issaquena, Sharkey Warren, Bolivar, Sunflower, Leflore, Washington, Humphreys, Covington and Jones in Mississippi. * WIND...Variable in direction up to 10 mph with gusts up to 15 to 20 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 25 to 30 percent, especially in southeastern Mississippi. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will create explosive fire growth potential.
